name: Your Hogwarts Story
description:
Play the beginning of your own Hogwarts story. Decide who you are and live through the experience of getting a letter from the famous school of witchcraft and wizardry. Go shopping in Diagonalley, take the Hogwarts-Express and get sorted into a house.

 This short Choose-Your-Own-Adventure-Text-Game is a fun little project I might continue at some point, but for now ends with the sorting ceremony. All rights belong to Warner Brothers and JKR (though I don’t agree one bit with her views on trans people. Trans rights are Human rights, period!) This is a non profit fan-game just for the purpose of entertainment.
